name: <rc::Weak<T, A> as core::clone::Clone>::clone

rc::Weak::<T, A>::inner.doc:
Returns `None` when the pointer is dangling and there is no allocated `RcInner`,
 (i.e., when this `Weak` was created by `Weak::new`).
